original_text: Thou shalt also decree a thing, and it shall be established unto thee: and the light shall shine upon thy ways.
korean_text: 네가 무엇을 결정하면 이루어질 것이요 네 길에 빛이 비치리라

sentences.original_text: Thou shalt also decree a thing
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 또한 한 가지를 명령할 것이요

sentences.original_text: and it shall be established unto thee
and light shall shine upon thy ways
